name: Don't Make Any Trouble
description:
- Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 - 'Let there be chaos'

AD to move 
SPACE to jump

[Story]

    You just received a letter : your lovely grandma just made your favorite jam again and is inviting you to her home. Just go. But she also ask you to not make any trouble crossing the city. Simple, isn't it ? 

     And what about grandpa ?

Can you make it without breaking anything ?

[About the development]

This is my first game jam. Every criticism is welcome since it is constructive. 

     I was alone working on this game that I started right when the Game Jam started. I made everything by myself using Unity including scripts, programming, logic, and graphics. I didn't make sounds due to the lack of time so I picked them on https://freesound.org/home/. Except for the sounds, everything used in this project was made during the Game Jam. This is also my first time doing pixel art and pixel art animation, so please be gentle c:

I recorded everything while working and I'll make a video about it soon. Link will be put here.

Thanks for playing my game c:

Disclaimer : It's possible

 - Known issues -

On some computer the game over screen doesn't trigger when attackers reach you or when time is out. Maybe try on a other browser ?
